attributes.action: Harry Kane to get a Knighthood when England win the World Cup
attributes.background: Harry Kane deserves a Knighthood after carrying England to the World Cup and scoring outrageous and world class goals in the progress

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
